metadata.description: Presenting a delightful (and delicious) all-ages adventure!  In a hidden faerie kingdom, Cookie, a young misfit elf, is facing big worries for a wee folk: He just wants to eat his favorite food -- cookies from the human world -- in peace, but other critters are stealing them, after HE stole them fair and square!  And now this lost human child and her dog have stumbled into his life, sparking an unexpected journey for them both!
metadata.name: Cookie and the Kid
